category-def.name: Common
category-def.label: CommonID
category-def.description: This Category contains the plugins generating the ClockSystem models. All Transformation rules and Action Calls leading to the generation of such files is implemented in the given plugins.

category-def.name: ClkSysWin
category-def.label: ClockSystem core (Windows ONLY)
category-def.description: This category contains the core features and the windows VM for ClockSystem.

category-def.name: ClkSysLinux
category-def.label: ClockSystem core Linux ONLY)
category-def.description: This category contains the core features and the linux VM for ClockSystem.
